course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Popular Culture of East Asia
course.description: This course provides an overview of the various forms of popular culture in East Asia and focuses on the question of how the rise of East Asian popular culture reflects the desire for "modernity" and "modernization" in each East Asian country and affects the interactions among them. Numerous popular cultural forms - music, film, TV drama, manga/anime, novels, entertainment, food, fashion and design - in Japan, Korea, China, Hong Kong, and Taiwan will be examined. The increasing global fascination of or craze for East Asian popular culture and how such East Asian "soft power" has inspired and transformed the global aesthetics and popular imagination or understanding of East Asia will also be discussed.

reviews.author: hyhying
reviews.comment_content: The content is quite interesting, and the videos for each week are quite nice. Sometimes, there were discussion in the classes.
reviews.comment_teaching: Her voice is quite weak if you are not wearing the ear phone, sometimes I find it hard to catch up when she talked a lot over a simple slide. Many videos will be played during the classes.
reviews.comment_grading: Fair to me, probably because I don't participate much in the class and our group work is not that good. And there is a short quiz in the beginning of the class, not difficult if you read the paper of that week.I think it is perfectly okay even you are not attending the class, it doesn't affect your grading much.
reviews.comment_workload: Very light workload, bi-weekly class, one group project and one individual assignment.Presentation is not counted towards the grading.No mid-term or final exam.

reviews.author: can
reviews.title: 靚grade又唔洗讀既course
reviews.comment_content:
成個course都係講食物
每兩個星期先上一次堂
上堂前要睇reading 同電影，會有mini quiz
電影都幾好睇，中日台韓香港都會有
reviews.comment_teaching:
prof好好人 上堂parti 可以係個chat box度打字都得 唔洗一定要開speaker 講野
如果太多deadline 可以request extend 份assignment 個deadline,有合理既理由佢就會比

上堂基本上有90%都係佢講緊野 可以掛機
reviews.comment_grading:
好少workload

上堂前有mini quiz 只要你睇曬D reading 同電影就一定識
有class parti 我估是但打D野係chat box 就ok
group project就做咩都得 可以作歌，拍短片，自由度好大
final essay 就5頁double space, analyse番其中一個reading or movie 就可以

佢冇比我地知個分就直接出grade

Final grade: A+
reviews.comment_workload:
Class Participation 10%
In-class quiz 30%
Final paper 30%

Group Project
-Presentation 5%
-One creative art 15%
-One paper 10%

reviews.author: s20031076
reviews.title: 有興趣就會好grade
reviews.comment_content: 雖然話就話中日台韓都有，日本台灣部分佔最多（可能因為professor係臺灣人）。個人認為有趣部份包括日本動漫（有講多啦A夢小丸子海賊王果d），日韓劇（比較舊：冬日戀歌，東京戀愛故事），同埋各地歌曲。悶d就有tokyo story（套野好悶但係都幾重點考）仲有d其他電影（好唔好睇見仁見智，個人麻麻地）。主要都係分析以上作品點反映當時文化同歷史背景。Notes有好多，記左essay寫番出黎就好高分。
reviews.comment_teaching: 好注重參與，聲稱自己完sem會記得80%人名，參與度唔高的同學grade都唔會好（其實認真溫notes，認真做group project就唔會低分）。把聲唔係幾好聽，所以都冇認真上。不過一定要上堂，因為ppt會好後期先up上canvas（真係就final先up，想溫都冇得溫）同埋有d slides上堂講ppt唔比（通常係片果d）
reviews.comment_grading:
Mid－term mean係C。但我讀果個sem professor話普遍成績差，所以估計唔完全係拉grade。
Mid－term：差一分A－
essay一篇10/10
另一篇冇grdae
Project：13/15
最後A－
reviews.comment_workload: 唔算大。雖然成日有pop up quiz，但通常都係上wiki睇完簡介就答倒（考content唔考分析，主要想知你有冇睇）。Mid－term彈性好大，好多題essay任揀幾題做。可以淨係溫你熟悉的topics。最大workload應該係group project。重點係要有心，有人拍片有人畫漫畫。同埋唔好free ride。

reviews.author: eeeee
reviews.comment_content: Content of this course revolves around introduction of pop culture in HK, Japan, Korea and Taiwan. Movies, pop songs, cartoons and TV drama will be discussed to help you understand more the difference between them.
reviews.comment_teaching: I like her way of teaching as she explains the concept clearly. Even if you dont understand, she is willing to help after class.
reviews.comment_grading: She is strict on grading and she demands quality output from students, even if you are not GCS students. Absolute grading was used for midterm in this semester as she said students did not pay effort in studying for the midterm. I would say somehow she is a bit subjective in grading.
reviews.comment_workload: Workload is a bit high as you will have to read some articles/ watch movies/ cartoons/ TV drama before class. But if you enjoy doing so, you will find it ok. Anyway you will still have to prepare for the lessons as there will be pop quiz (around 4-6? i forgot)

reviews.author: August
reviews.title: Best course in UST
reviews.comment_content: I strongly recommend this course for Exchange students who want to know more about East Asia, and Full time students who feel that they lack knowledge about their background, or feel confused with their identity.
reviews.comment_teaching: Study the East Asian culture through movies, dramas, music, and some readings.
reviews.comment_grading: Grade is not published yet, but you get the grades on assignments or midterm of what you deserved for.
reviews.comment_workload: Compared to other HUMA 1000s courses, workload might be heavy, with 3 essay assignments, 5 pop quizes, 1 group project, 1 group project report, and midterm.
